svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
July 27, 2024" date: "2024-07-27"
Eth News and Links
Spot ETH ETFs launched in US and support Roman Storm legal defense
All core devs
* All core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) #138 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade :
Pectra-devnet-1 launched, multiple issues being debugged Request types :
ExecutionPayloadEnvelope proposal: broad support to move request data needed for state
transition outside structure that CL clients prune Unify request objects proposal:
intend to move forward SSZ StableContainer : no strong push for inclusion, focus on
existing Pectra EIPs before considering increasing scope EIP7594 PeerDAS :
Simplification proposal to drop peer sampling phase from Pectra Discussion on when to
activate (currently separate epoch to Pectra) BeaconBlocksByRange v3 proposal
* Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : Pectra-devnet-1 launched, multiple issues being
debugged Request types : ExecutionPayloadEnvelope proposal: broad support to move
request data needed for state transition outside structure that CL clients prune Unify
request objects proposal: intend to move forward SSZ StableContainer : no strong push
for inclusion, focus on existing Pectra EIPs before considering increasing scope
EIP7594 PeerDAS : Simplification proposal to drop peer sampling phase from Pectra
Discussion on when to activate (currently separate epoch to Pectra)
BeaconBlocksByRange v3 proposal
* Pectra-devnet-1 launched, multiple issues being debugged
Pectra-devnet-1 launched, multiple issues being debugged
* Request types : ExecutionPayloadEnvelope proposal: broad support to move request
data needed for state transition outside structure that CL clients prune Unify request
objects proposal: intend to move forward
Request types :
* ExecutionPayloadEnvelope proposal: broad support to move request data needed for
state transition outside structure that CL clients prune
transition outside structure that CL clients prune
* Unify request objects proposal: intend to move forward
Unify request objects proposal: intend to move forward
* SSZ StableContainer : no strong push for inclusion, focus on existing Pectra EIPs
before considering increasing scope
SSZ StableContainer : no strong push for inclusion, focus on existing Pectra EIPs
* EIP7594 PeerDAS : Simplification proposal to drop peer sampling phase from Pectra
EIP7594 PeerDAS :
* Simplification proposal to drop peer sampling phase from Pectra
Simplification proposal to drop peer sampling phase from Pectra
* Discussion on when to activate (currently separate epoch to Pectra)
* BeaconBlocksByRange v3 proposal
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, likely targeting Q1 2025
* PeerDAS breakout #4 : Teams focused on client stability, optimization & refactoring
before launching peerdas-devnet-2
PeerDAS breakout #4 :
* Teams focused on client stability, optimization & refactoring before launching
peerdas-devnet-2
* EOF taxonomy diagram
EOF taxonomy diagram
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 29.05% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 29.05% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Consensus layer: Prysm 35% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
* Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
* EIP7732 ePBS: Terence: builder bidding strategies under ePBS market space rules
* Terence: builder bidding strategies under ePBS market space rules
Research
* Toni WahrstÃ¤tter: EIP7716 anti-correlation penalties for diseconomies of scale
Toni WahrstÃ¤tter: EIP7716 anti-correlation penalties for diseconomies of scale
* Block builder concentration analysis
Block builder concentration analysis
Client Releases
* Execution layer: Erigon: v2.60.5 : improvements & fixes v3.0.0-alpha1 : all-in-one
(execution layer + Caplin consensus layer) node Nethermind v1.27.1 : fix improperly
enabled pre-warming blocks on OP Stack chains
* Erigon: v2.60.5 : improvements & fixes v3.0.0-alpha1 : all-in-one (execution layer +
Caplin consensus layer) node
Erigon:
* v2.60.5 : improvements & fixes
v2.60.5 : improvements & fixes
* v3.0.0-alpha1 : all-in-one (execution layer + Caplin consensus layer) node
v3.0.0-alpha1 : all-in-one (execution layer + Caplin consensus layer) node
* Nethermind v1.27.1 : fix improperly enabled pre-warming blocks on OP Stack chains
Nethermind v1.27.1 : fix improperly enabled pre-warming blocks on OP Stack chains
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7747 : EVM modular arithmetic extensions
EIP7748 : State conversion to Verkle Tree
* EIP7747 : EVM modular arithmetic extensions
EIP7747 : EVM modular arithmetic extensions
* EIP7748 : State conversion to Verkle Tree
Stuff for developers
* Foundry Anvil adds EIP7702 support
Foundry Anvil adds EIP7702 support
* Eclair : Solidity interpreter, focused on contract interactions
Eclair : Solidity interpreter, focused on contract interactions
* Guide to improving Foundry testing using fuzzing & invariant testing
Guide to improving Foundry testing using fuzzing & invariant testing
* RareSkills: Solidity try/catch guide, handling low-level call failure Beacon proxy
pattern explainer
RareSkills:
* Solidity try/catch guide, handling low-level call failure
Solidity try/catch guide, handling low-level call failure
* Beacon proxy pattern explainer
Beacon proxy pattern explainer
* Tips: Solidity arrays & memory Solady LibString for string concatenation
Tips:
* Solidity arrays & memory
Solidity arrays & memory
* Solady LibString for string concatenation
Solady LibString for string concatenation
* Sandwich-resistant AMM : application-layer approach to mitigate atomic sandwich
attacks
Sandwich-resistant AMM : application-layer approach to mitigate atomic sandwich
* Trevm : typestate interface to revm
Trevm : typestate interface to revm
* Viem v2.18 : adds ERC-4337 Account Abstraction extension
Viem v2.18 : adds ERC-4337 Account Abstraction extension
Security
* MonoSwap $1.3M stolen on Blast via phishing of developer
MonoSwap $1.3M stolen on Blast via phishing of developer
* Spectra $550k exploit via arbitrary call to any address
Spectra $550k exploit via arbitrary call to any address
Enterprise
* Toyota research into mobility accounts based on ERC4337 account abstraction
Job Listings
* Aragon: Senior Smart Contract Developer
Aragon: Senior Smart Contract Developer
* EF Protocol Support : generalist to help with ACD, EPF, SoP & more
EF Protocol Support : generalist to help with ACD, EPF, SoP & more
* EF seek a European/Civil Law qualified Legal Counsel
EF seek a European/Civil Law qualified Legal Counsel
* Nethermind: Senior Device Security Engineer , Senior DevOps Engineer AMER & APAC ,
Full Stack Lead APAC, Post-Grad Internship & App Security Engineer
Nethermind: Senior Device Security Engineer , Senior DevOps Engineer AMER & APAC ,
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 1.1 to 46.7 gwei, 4.5 gwei average; zero net
issuance at 23.6 gwei 15k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
* Gas: 1.1 to 46.7 gwei, 4.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.6 gwei
Gas: 1.1 to 46.7 gwei, 4.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.6 gwei
* 15k ETH net issuance this week
15k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $3,099 - $3,538, currently $3,265, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $3,099 - $3,538, currently $3,265, all time high $4,878
* ETHBTC : currently 0.048 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.048 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
* Coinbase : free conversion from USDT on Tron to USDC on Base for parts of Latin
America, Africa & Asia
Coinbase : free conversion from USDT on Tron to USDC on Base for parts of Latin
* Atari X Asteroids live on Base, mint to play
Atari X Asteroids live on Base, mint to play
* Zora Sparks : changing display units to 1/1000000 ETH (Szabo)
Zora Sparks : changing display units to 1/1000000 ETH (Szabo)
Regulation/business/tokens
* Spot ETH ETFs launched in US: ETF flow dashboard
Spot ETH ETFs launched in US:
* ETF flow dashboard
* UK Financial Conduct Authority fined Coinbase Â£3.5M for user onboarding with
restrictions in place
UK Financial Conduct Authority fined Coinbase Â£3.5M for user onboarding with
General
* Support Roman Storm legal defense via Juicebox fundraiser
Support Roman Storm legal defense via Juicebox fundraiser
* Vitalik: circle STARKs (implemented in Stwo & Plonky3)
Vitalik: circle STARKs (implemented in Stwo & Plonky3)
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-july-27-2024
